name: A Kingdom's Sacrifice
description:
This is a quick Gameboy Pocket themed RPG like  visual novel game I made for a school project. Not all the endings have art and text but I hope to add them in the future. The assignment required a visual novel and I was curious what one of those types of games might have looked like if it were played on a Gameboy Pocket including all the tropes and stereotypical aspects of early rpgs such as Final Fantasy or Chrono Trigger . Due to time constraints I wasn't able to fully flesh out the art like I would have liked as I was more focused on the mechanics and effects I wanted to include. I really enjoyed putting this together and I hope to find the time in the future to juice it up and make it a fuller experience. 

Summary: Help a young cleric named Kudelia escape her fate that was constructed by the kingdoms sacred texts and find the key to harnessing her magical powers to take the throne!
